```{r echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
packages = c('R6','data.tree','ahpsurvey')
for (p in packages){ 
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p) 
  }
  library(p,character.only = T) 
}
```
